attributes.action: either reduce the age of cervical smears to 18 or raise the age for the vacination against cervical cancer to 25 the age a smear can be given
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment there is a seven year gap whereby woman 18-25 are unable to obtain protection for cervical cancer. They do not qualify for the vacination nor can they access a smear.  To protect these woman the government should either reduce the age for smears down to 18 or increase the age for vacination to 25.
